description: Lists the values reported for an IoT Device Defender metric (device-side metric, cloud-side metric, or custom metric) by the given thing during the specified time period.

parameters.name: thingName
parameters.description: The name of the thing for which security profile metric values are returned.

parameters.name: metricName
parameters.description: The name of the security profile metric for which values are returned.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The start of the time period for which metric values are returned.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The end of the time period for which metric values are returned.

nested_items.name: metricDatumList
nested_items.description: The data the thing reports for the metric during the specified time period.

nested_items.name: timestamp
nested_items.description: The time the metric value was reported.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: If the comparisonOperator calls for a numeric value, use this to specify that numeric value to be compared with the metric.

nested_items.name: cidrs
nested_items.description: If the comparisonOperator calls for a set of CIDRs, use this to specify that set to be compared with the metric.

nested_items.name: ports
nested_items.description: If the comparisonOperator calls for a set of ports, use this to specify that set to be compared with the metric.

nested_items.name: number
nested_items.description: The numeral value of a metric.

nested_items.name: numbers
nested_items.description: The numeral values of a metric.

nested_items.name: strings
nested_items.description: The string values of a metric.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
